title: feat: auto-install OpenClaw and auto-onboard in setup script
author: voodoohop

gist.summary: The setup script now automatically installs OpenClaw and handles the full onboarding process in a single step.
gist.impact: New users can get started faster with a simplified 2-step landing page and automated configuration.
gist.image_prompt: Cozy pixel art scene of the Pollinations bee watching a cute robot claw machine assemble itself. Soft lime green (#ecf874) and pastel gradient background. Chunky retro sprites, warm lighting, lo-fi vibes like Stardew Valley. Text 'AUTO SETUP' in pixel font. Nostalgic but beautiful.
